html:div.html:a:
XML created with
CB Context Menu Extended

custombutton.name: Preference Switcher (Basic)
custombutton.help:
𝗨𝘀𝗮𝗴𝗲 ⚫ Edit this button Initialization tab to change its preferences. ⚫ The 𝗽𝗿𝗲𝗳𝗡𝗮𝗺𝗲 variable is the full name of the preference that you want to control with this button. ⚫ The 𝘀𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗰𝗵𝗕𝘂𝘁𝘁𝗼𝗻𝗜𝗺𝗮𝗴𝗲 variable set to true will allow you to change this button image depending on the preference current value. ⚫ The 𝗯𝗼𝗼𝗹𝗘𝗻𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲𝗱𝗜𝗺𝗮𝗴𝗲 and 𝗯𝗼𝗼𝗹𝗗𝗶𝘀𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲𝗱𝗜𝗺𝗮𝗴𝗲 variables are the images used by 𝗯𝗼𝗼𝗹𝗲𝗮𝗻 preferences. ⚫ The 𝗽𝗿𝗲𝗳𝗩𝗮𝗹𝘂𝗲𝘀 variable is an array of values for 𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗴𝗲𝗿 and/or 𝘀𝘁𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 preferences. It has to have at least 2 values. Every time this button is clicked, the preference will switch its value between the values defined here. ⚫ The 𝗽𝗿𝗲𝗳𝗜𝗺𝗮𝗴𝗲𝘀 variable is an array of links to images for 𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗴𝗲𝗿 and/or 𝘀𝘁𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 preferences. The first image in this variable correspond to the first value in the 𝗽𝗿𝗲𝗳𝗩𝗮𝗹𝘂𝗲𝘀 variable. The second image, to the second value in the 𝗽𝗿𝗲𝗳𝗩𝗮𝗹𝘂𝗲𝘀 variable, and so forth.
𝗜𝗺𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗻𝗼𝘁𝗲𝘀 ⚫ This button can be cloned/installed countless times to control/switch any preference of any type. ⚫ If the preference you wish to control/switch doesn't exists, you will be asked to create it on the fly.
[,]
